channel.title: Capes and EXP
channel.description:
[b]Capes[/b] how do i changed the lvl required to wear the skill cape? the level is set to 100, i want to be able to wear it at level 99 because my max lvl is 99. can you help?
[b]EXP Points[/b] How do i change the exp amount i earn when i attack npcs? usuall when i attack something... i gain 20 lvls, how do i change that?
thank you
P.S. My Server is going to be the best! lol

item.title: Capes and EXP
item.dc:creator: @s3x_4_u_l1f3 s3x 4 u l1f3
item.description:
@s3x_4_u_l1f3 wrote:

Wearing.java[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 18, 2009, 08:49:43 am[/size][hr]go to ur client.java and serth for
totalexp
u will see it

double TotalExp = 0;
if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) {
TotalExp = (double)(QQQQhitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 18);
} else if (FightType != 3) {
TotalExp = (double)(QQQQhitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID);
} else {
TotalExp = (double)(QQQQhitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerSlayer);
}
TotalExp = (double)(QQQhitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
attackTimer = 7;
chage QQQ to ur exp
searth again for totalexp and do it again

Read full topic
